text:
I checked in on this 2-3 days ago and all I could find was, “no”. 
BUT… Looks like patches out today include an update! 
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/en-US/advisory/CVE-2023-38545

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] November Patch Tuesday Analysis by Action1
metadata.email_text_original:
You don't often get email from mjudd@360smartnet.com. Learn why this is
important [https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification] 
I checked in on this 2-3 days ago and all I could find was, “no”. 
BUT… Looks like patches out today include an update! 
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/en-US/advisory/CVE-2023-38545
[https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fmsrc.microsoft.com%2Fupdate-guide%2Fen-US%2Fadvisory%2FCVE-2023-38545&data=05%7C01%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7Cfefbe2ce07ec41c3d79108dbe54bc13b%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638355886072065896%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=GvfO3wAzSCV7LYHEk6N7i2XXMKxoF5q3muzAxESPohQ%3D&reserved=0] 
From: 'Laurie Reynolds' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, November 14, 2023 2:22 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] November Patch Tuesday Analysis by Action1 
Thanks for sharing 
Does anyone know if MS have pulled their finger out and patched Curl yet on
their OS’s?
Link: https://groups.google.com/d/msgid/patchmanagement/BL3PR16MB4425CC837F8B2575F112C415F4B2A%40BL3PR16MB4425.namprd16.prod.outlook.com
